00034 class anchor extends rules
00035 {
00036     function parse ($rule_string)
00037     {
00038         $data = array();
00039         if (strpos($rule_string, "#")) {
00040             $data['comment'] = substr($rule_string, strpos($rule_string, "#") + '1');
00041             $rule_string =  substr($rule_string, '0', strpos($rule_string, "#"));
00042         }
00043 
00044         foreach (preg_split("/[\s,\t]+/", $rule_string, '-1', PREG_SPLIT_NO_EMPTY) as $rule) {
00045             $rules[] = preg_replace("/\"/", "", $rule);
00046         }
00047         
00048         $data['anchor'] = $rules['1'];
00049         $data['filename'] = $rules['3'];
00050         return $data;
00051     }
00052 
00053     function generate ()
00054     {
00055         $data = "\n";
00056         if ($this->rules) {
00057             foreach ($this->rules as $rule) {
00058                 if ($rule['type'] == 'comment') {
00059                     $lines = preg_split("/\n/", stripslashes($rule['comment']));
00060                     $data .= "\n";
00061                     foreach ($lines as $line) {
00062                         $data .= "# ". $line. "\n";
00063                     }
00064                     continue;
00065                 }
00066                 $data .= "load anchor ". $rule['anchor']. " from ". $rule['filename'];
00067 
00068                 if ($rule['comment']) {
00069                     $data .= " # ". trim(stripslashes($rule['comment']));
00070                 }
00071                 $data .= "\n";
00072             }
00073             $data .= "\n";
00074         }
00075         return $data;
00076     }
00077 }
00078 
00079 ?>
